name: Nirmala Kumar
summary: Transformational Product Leader and MIT-trained CTO with 20+ years of experience leading enterprise digital transformations and technical product delivery.

corePillarsOfExpertise.description: Defining the 'North Star' for complex High-Tech products; aligning market needs with engineering feasibility.
Designing resilient, cloud-native frameworks for mission-critical enterprise applications (HL7/FHIR, HIPAA/HITECH).
Navigating the SDLC from algorithmic design to global deployment and CI/CD automation.
Mentoring high-output teams and modernizing workflows through a lean, startup-focused lens.
Translating business goals into precise requirements for $2B+ scale platforms.

responsibilities.responsibility: Visionary Leadership: Founded and lead a venture-backed (or self-funded) startup focused on [Insert SpeakEQ core mission, e.g., communication analytics/EQ-driven tech].
Product Development: Architected the initial product roadmap, balancing rapid prototyping with long-term scalability and data privacy.
Strategic Growth: Driving business development and GTM strategy, positioning the platform for enterprise adoption.
EHR Modernization: Directed the technical vision for department-wide EHR and POS systems, transitioning legacy databases to modern, scalable architectures.
Culture Shift: Implemented GitHub and automated workflows to shift the organization toward a high-velocity, 'startup-style' delivery model.
Compliance & Data: Audited and optimized centralized data hubs ensuring HIPAA integrity and actionable business insights.
Enterprise Scaling: Led cross-functional teams through the end-to-end delivery of complex enterprise software serving millions of constituents.
Stakeholder Alignment: Navigated complex C-suite/Public-sector requirements to align technical roadmaps with high ROI outcomes.
Governance: Managed full SDLC for mission-critical systems, ensuring zero downtime during major platform upgrades.

professionalExperience.title: Project Manager / Product Owner / Scrum Master

responsibilities.responsibility: High-Visibility Programs: Managed the 'BlackFlag' initiative, bridging Marketing and Engineering for high-stakes programs like Netbond and DirecTV.
Agile Transformation: Led Scrum ceremonies for distributed teams, improving sprint velocity by 25%.
Release Management: Managed end-to-end project lifecycles for global Telecom clients, focusing on scope, risk mitigation, and successful market launches.
Strategy & QA: Defined UAT strategy for Microsoft volume licensing; led defect management for Toyota Entune (TGT) and REI eCommerce launches.

technicalSkillsAndCompliance.ehrHealthTechKnowledge: Workflow optimization (Avatar/Cerner style), Data Architecture, Interoperability.

technicalSkillsAndCompliance.technologies: Cloud-Native Frameworks, GitHub, CI/CD, Enterprise System Architecture, Technical Product Management (TPM)
